articles.title: UK weather: Yellow heat health alerts issued for most of England
articles.description: Yellow heat health alerts have been issued for most of England - with temperatures forecast to hit highs of 33C (91F) this weekend.
articles.content:

articles.title: You can now go on a double date with your friend using Tinder
articles.description: Currently available in the US and select markets, Tinder plans to roll out 'Double Date' globally in July.
articles.content: Tinder has rolled out a new feature called 'Double Date,’ allowing users to team up with a friend and match with other pairs. The new group-style format is aimed at making dating more social, especially for GenZ, which makes up over half the app's gl... [1115 chars]

articles.title: Toto Wolff: Red Bull's protest 'petty' and 'embarrassing' against Mercedes' George Russell
articles.description: Mercedes team principal Toto Wolff says Red Bull's protest against George Russell at the Canadian Grand Prix was "petty" and "embarrassing".
articles.content:
Mercedes team principal Toto Wolff says Red Bull's protest was "petty" and "embarrassing" as George Russell finished first ahead of four-time world champion Max Verstappen at Sunday's Canadian Grand Prix.

articles.title: Angelo Mathews receives moving tribute from teammates as Sri Lanka great takes field in farewell Test vs Bangladesh
articles.description: Angelo Mathews received a guard of honour as he took the field for the final time in Tests during Sri Lanka's first match of the series against Bangladesh. | Cricket
articles.content: Sixteen years after making his Test debut at the Galle International Stadium, Angelo Mathews returned to the same venue for his final appearance in the whites, closing the chapter on a red-ball career that has shaped Sri Lankan cricket for over a dec... [2165 chars]

articles.title: Millions who have suffered a single bout of food poisoning could be at higher risk of bowel cancer: Doctors reveal how little-known toxin lingers in the body
articles.description: Every year in the UK around 2.4million people fall ill with food poisoning that leaves them suffering from vomiting and crippling stomach cramps.
articles.content:
Every year in the UK around 2.4million people fall ill with food poisoning that leaves them suffering from vomiting, diarrhoea and crippling stomach cramps.

articles.title: Kraft Heinz to remove artificial dyes in U.S.
articles.description: Kraft Heinz also said it will not launch any new products in the U.S. with artificial dyes, effective immediately.
articles.content:
Kraft Heinz said Tuesday that it will remove FD&C artificial dyes from its products by the end of 2027, and will not launch any new products in the U.S. containing those ingredients.

articles.title: AI-Designed Proteins Created De Novo with New AlphaDesign
articles.description: By designing proteins de novo scientists can more efficiently create novel therapeutics tailored for specific biological functions.
